title: Secret Plot Deep
description:
Continuation of the adventures of nyphomanical High School teachers Miki and Mayumi as they take advantage of the student body to get laid wherever they can, including it seems, the Fukushima Nuclear Reactor.

Originally published in Japan in 1995, official English release in 1997. English version is read Left to Right.
